sect2.title: ZIndexEvent
sect2.para: Represents an event caused by a component whose z-index is modified by the client. A z-indexed component must send ZindexEvent once the z-index of component is modifiable by the client.
The components which are supported this event are: org.zkoss.zul.Window .

entry.para: Returns the z-index of the component after moved.
